about_info:
HoloKitv1.0.0 kairo,
I created this app to practice my skills to prepare for my studies
Thank you to the API creators/maintaners!
api_interval_about: HoloKit will sync with the API to update the stream list at a specified minute interval
cannot_connect_api:
Cannot connect to API! Check your internet connection
or try again later
welcome_holokit: Welcome to HoloKit, on the left is a sidebar, try clicking on any button to find out what it does
welcome_holokit_sub:
This is a hobby projects and I do not assure you this is bug free
Please report any bugs you encounter!
asset_load: Please wait for assets to load...
no_streams: Looks like no one is streaming
